languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс недовольно кривится, странно поглядывая на вас.{/n} "Ах, вы не знаете? Тогда позвольте напомнить — вам и всему трибуналу". {n}В руках дознавателя тут же появляется инфопластина, облепленная печатями чистоты.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс недовольно кривится, странно поглядывая на вас.{/n} "Ах, вы не знаете? Тогда позвольте напомнить — вам и всему трибуналу". {n}В руках дознавателя тут же появляется инфопластина, помеченная печатями чистоты.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix makes a disgruntled face, looking at you strangely.{/n} "Oh, you do not know, do you? Allow me to remind you, then, and the entire court as well." {n}A data-slate appears in the Interrogator's hands, adorned with purity seals on both sides.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс недовольно кривится, странно поглядывая на вас.{/n} "Ах, вы не знаете? Тогда позвольте напомнить — вам и всему трибуналу". {n}В руках дознавателя тут же появляется инфопластина, облепленная печатями чистоты.{/n}

{n}Heinrix makes a disgruntled face, looking at you strangely.{/n} "Oh, you do not know, do you? Allow me to remind you, then, and the entire court as well." {n}A data-slate appears in the Interrogator's hands, adorned with purity seals on both sides.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix affiche une mine renfrognée et vous dévisage d'un air étrange.{/n} « Oh, vous n'êtes pas au courant, n'est-ce pas ? Permettez-moi de vous rafraîchir la mémoire dans ce cas, ainsi qu'à l'ensemble de la cour. » {n}L'interrogateur sort une plaque de données ornée de sceaux de pureté sur les deux faces.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix makes a disgruntled face, looking at you strangely.{/n} "Oh, you do not know, do you? Allow me to remind you, then, and the entire court as well." {n}A data-slate appears in the Interrogator's hands, adorned with purity seals on both sides.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix affiche une mine renfrognée et vous dévisage d'un air étrange.{/n} « Oh, vous n'êtes pas au courant, n'est-ce pas ? Permettez-moi de vous rafraîchir la mémoire dans ce cas, ainsi qu'à l'ensemble de la cour. » {n}L'interrogateur sort une plaque de données ornée de sceaux de pureté sur les deux faces.{/n}

languages.text: {n}海因里希露出不满的表情，以古怪的眼神看着你。{/n}“噢，你不知道，是这样吗？请允许我代表整个法庭，好好提醒你一下。”{n}海因里希手中出现一块数据板，两边装饰着纯洁印记。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix makes a disgruntled face, looking at you strangely.{/n} "Oh, you do not know, do you? Allow me to remind you, then, and the entire court as well." {n}A data-slate appears in the Interrogator's hands, adorned with purity seals on both sides.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希露出不满的表情，以古怪的眼神看着你。{/n}“噢，你不知道，是这样吗？请允许我代表整个法庭，好好提醒你一下。”{n}海因里希手中出现一块数据板，两边装饰着纯洁印记。{/n}

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは不満そうな顔をし、あなたを奇異の目で見ている。{/n}「ああ、ご存じないということかな？ではあなたと法廷の皆さんに教えてさしあげよう」{n}インテロゲイターの手に、両面に純潔の印章が施されたデータスレートが現れた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix makes a disgruntled face, looking at you strangely.{/n} "Oh, you do not know, do you? Allow me to remind you, then, and the entire court as well." {n}A data-slate appears in the Interrogator's hands, adorned with purity seals on both sides.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは不満そうな顔をし、あなたを奇異の目で見ている。{/n}「ああ、ご存じないということかな？ではあなたと法廷の皆さんに教えてさしあげよう」{n}インテロゲイターの手に、両面に純潔の印章が施されたデータスレートが現れた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix' Gesicht verzieht sich und er blickt dich seltsam an.{/n} "Oh, Ihr wisst es also nicht, was? Gestattet mir also, Euch und auch den gesamten Hof aufzuklären." {n}In den Händen des Interrogators erscheint ein Datablock, der auf beiden Seiten mit Reinheitssiegeln versehen ist.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix makes a disgruntled face, looking at you strangely.{/n} "Oh, you do not know, do you? Allow me to remind you, then, and the entire court as well." {n}A data-slate appears in the Interrogator's hands, adorned with purity seals on both sides.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix' Gesicht verzieht sich und er blickt dich seltsam an.{/n} "Oh, Ihr wisst es also nicht, was? Gestattet mir also, Euch und auch den gesamten Hof aufzuklären." {n}In den Händen des Interrogators erscheint ein Datablock, der auf beiden Seiten mit Reinheitssiegeln versehen ist.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix hace una mueca de contrariedad y te mira de un modo extraño.{/n} «Oh, entonces usted no lo sabe, ¿no? Pues permítame que se lo recuerde, y de paso al resto del tribunal». {n}En las manos del interrogador aparece una tablilla de datos decorada con sellos de pureza a ambos lados.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix makes a disgruntled face, looking at you strangely.{/n} "Oh, you do not know, do you? Allow me to remind you, then, and the entire court as well." {n}A data-slate appears in the Interrogator's hands, adorned with purity seals on both sides.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix hace una mueca de contrariedad y te mira de un modo extraño.{/n} «Oh, entonces usted no lo sabe, ¿no? Pues permítame que se lo recuerde, y de paso al resto del tribunal». {n}En las manos del interrogador aparece una tablilla de datos decorada con sellos de pureza a ambos lados.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, hoşnutsuz bir yüz ifadesiyle sana tuhaf tuhaf bakıyor.{/n} "Ha, haberin yok sahi. Sana ve divana dâhil olan herkese hatırlatmama izin ver o hâlde." {n}Sorgucu'nun elinde, iki tarafı da saflık mühürüyle süslü bir databela beliriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix makes a disgruntled face, looking at you strangely.{/n} "Oh, you do not know, do you? Allow me to remind you, then, and the entire court as well." {n}A data-slate appears in the Interrogator's hands, adorned with purity seals on both sides.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix hoşnutsuz bir yüz ifadesiyle sana tuhaf tuhaf bakıyor.{/n} "Ah, haberin yok sahi, değil mi? Sana ve divana dâhil olan herkese hatırlatmama izin ver o hâlde." {n}Sorgucu'nun elinde iki tarafı da arındırıcı mühürlerle süslenmiş bir databela beliriyor.{/n}
